course_title: Adult Gerontological Acute Care Nurse Practitioner II
class_notes: Online asynchronous and synchronous face-to-face intensives dates: June 10 and 11.
course_description: The second course in a 3-course series focuses on serious acute illness and exacerbation of chronic illness in adults/older adults from a systems perspective. The role of the nurse practitioner as direct care provider, consultant and interdisciplinary team member in acute care settings is discussed.
prerequisites: NRSG 668 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1753, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
